It will be updated regularly as information becomes available

Guide to entitlements for over sixties
Treoir maidir le Faisnéis d’Fhágóirí Scoile
The links in this page give further information on the topics covered in the Citizens Information Board leaflet, ‘Guide to entitlements for over sixties 2016'

Treoir maidir le teidlíochtaí do dhaoine atá faoi mhíchumas

The links in this page give further information on the topics covered in the Citizens Information Board leaflet, ‘Guide to entitlements for people with disabilities 2016’. Guide to information for school leavers

Tugann na nascanna ar an leathanach seo tuilleadh faisnéise ar na hábhair a chlúdaítear i mbileog an Bhoird um Fhaisnéis do Shaoránaigh, ‘Treoir maidir le teidlíochtaí do dhaoine atá faoi mhíchumas 2016’
